name: Emiru's Maze v.1.0 DEMO
description:
IndieDb | Website | Donate

Travel the randomly generated worlds. Collect weapons and armor with unique stats and gear up your hero. Defeat the enemies and find your way home! The game consists of many levels. The only goal of each level is to find the exit. After passing the training levels, the levels are generated randomly. If you fail, it creates a whole new level. How far you can go?
